subject: Installation for SIMSONN HS Pro Dual Mode Shifter
description_text:
Hi ,

I was wondering what are the mounting options included for the SIMSONN HS
Pro Dual Mode Shifter  ,

I have an aluminum profile rig and wanted to make sure it would work
without a plate or whatnot.

Thanks ,

Alexandre Giordano

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexandre Giordano,  Please provide your HS Pro order number.
I don't have one , I'm asking before I buy as I mentionned.
Hi Alexandre Giordano,  I will check this for you and get back to you shortly. Sorry for the late reply, and thank you for your patience.

Hi Alexandre Giordano,    The device can be installed directly on single-profile or dual-profile rigs even without using a base plate. For detailed installation steps, mounting hole information, and setup instructions, please refer to the user manual.
Hi Alexandre Giordano,  This is the user manual. Please refer to it for detailed instructions.

Thanks for the information , do you have a link for the user manual ? I
can't find it anywhere on your website.

Never mind you just sent it ! Thank you

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 09:23 Alexandre Giordano <alexandregiordano1@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Thanks for the information , do you have a link for the user manual ? I
> can't find it anywhere on your website.
>
> On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 09:19 support@simsonn.com
